title: Deploy app to live network

requirements.text: Deploy the current version of the Student Marketplace Hub application (backend and frontend) to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend Motoko canister is deployed and running on the IC mainnet.
The frontend is deployed and accessible via a public IC URL.
All existing features (marketplace listings, service listings, papers upload, video sharing, admin dashboard, user profiles, meetup tracker) are functional on the live deployment.
Internet Identity authentication works on the live deployment.

constraints: Do not modify any application logic, UI, or data models â€” this is a deployment-only action.
Preserve all existing state and feature functionality from the current version.
nonGoals: Adding new features or fixing bugs as part of this deployment.
Changing any frontend or backend code.
